subject: Baseball
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Despite not being warned beforehand, A. J. Burnett was suspended for six games by Major League Baseball for throwing a ball over the head of the Texas Rangers’ Nelson Cruz.
snippet: Despite not being warned beforehand, A. J. Burnett was suspended for six games by Major League Baseball for throwing a ball over the head of the Texas Rangers’ Nelson Cruz.
